body_html: okay, current workaround for me is just to create the global_step variable in the evaluation file separately instead of loading it in: global_step = tf.Variable(0, dtype=tf.int32, name='global_step', trainable=False)
body_text: okay, current workaround for me is just to create the global_step variable in the evaluation file separately instead of loading it in: global_step = tf.Variable(0, dtype=tf.int32, name='global_step', trainable=False)
body: okay, current workaround for me is just to create the `global_step` variable in the evaluation file separately instead of loading it in: `global_step = tf.Variable(0, dtype=tf.int32, name='global_step', trainable=False)`
